name: A debtor Service Provider activates a debtor
fullName: A Debtor Service Providers activates a debtor: A debtor Service Provider activates a debtor

steps.name: Given the debtor Service Provider is authenticated
And the debtor A has fiscal code random
When the debtor Service Provider activates the debtor A
Then the debtor A is activated

labels.name: feature
labels.value: A Debtor Service Providers activates a debtor
